title: E.V.s Start With a Bigger Carbon Footprint. But That Doesn’t Last.
description: The manufacturing and disposal of electric vehicles result in more greenhouse gases than nonelectric models, but that difference will eventually disappear altogether.
dc:creator: Eric A. Taub
media:description: Studies have found that though it’s true that the production of a B.E.V. causes more pollution than a gasoline-powered counterpart, that greenhouse gas emission difference is erased as the vehicle is driven.
